content:
Dear diary,

Today is the first day of a new journey for Megan and me. My mother, the historian, has discovered an ancient technique that will allow us to have children together. I never thought this day would come, but here we are, starting a family together. I used to be a boy several years ago, but now I am a girl who is carrying my girlfriend's babies. It is a surreal feeling, and I am still trying to wrap my head around it.

The process started with herbal treatments, which were different for Megan and me. Megan took a series of herbs that were designed to increase her fertility and prepare her body for the transfer of her vaginal fluid. I, on the other hand, took a series of herbs that were designed to prepare my body to receive and sustain the fluid transfer.

Today was the day of the transfer. Megan was the donor and I was the recipient. The transfer itself was straightforward, although a little bit uncomfortable. Megan's vaginal fluid was transferred into my body through a series of injections. I could feel the warmth of the fluid as it entered my body, and I must admit, it was a strange sensation.

But, the most exciting part was the confirmation of my pregnancy. The team of physicians and scientists confirmed that I was indeed pregnant and that everything was going well. I could hardly contain my excitement when I heard the news.

Being a pregnant woman who was once a boy is an unusual experience. I feel blessed and grateful to be able to bring new life into this world with the woman I love. At the same time, I feel nervous and scared about the unknowns of the journey ahead. But, I am ready for the challenge, and I am confident that Megan and I will be the best mothers we can be.

This is just the beginning, and I cannot wait to see what the future holds for our family.

Lily.
